member.name: T:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.MvcRichTextEditor
member.summary: Represents a rich editing control that can be used to display or edit formatted text.
member.remarks:
A MvcRichTextEditor can display any HTML format text or plain unformatted text.
The following graphic shows an example of a MvcRichTextEditor.
--todo--
MvcRichTextEditor supports HTML source view as tabbed document.This can be achieved in the following way
public ActionResult RTECoreFeatures() { //Create a RTEModel RichTextEditorModel model = new RichTextEditorModel();
//Shows the toolbar
model.ShowToolBar = true;
//Shows HTML source as a tab
model.ShowHtmlSource = true;
model.DisableToolbarItems.Add(ToolbarItems.Bold);
ViewData["RTEModel"] = model;
return View();
}
MvcRichTextEditor supports a variety of keyboard commands. Find a list of keyboard commands.
Command Default key gesture
AlignCenter Ctrl+E
AlignJustify Ctrl+J
AlignLeft Ctrl+L
AlignRight Ctrl+R
Delete Delete
BackSpace BackSpace
Bold Ctrl+B
Italics Ctrl+I
Underline Ctrl+U
Cut Ctrl+X
Copy Ctrl+C
Paste Ctrl+V
Undo Ctrl+Z
Redo Ctrl+Y
Increase Intent Ctrl+M
Decrease Intent Ctrl+Shift+M

Gets or sets skin value which is applied for the TreeView
Skin name Applied for the TreeView control.
A string that represents the Name of the Css class applied for the TreeView control.
The following code example demonstrates how to use the SkinName property
TreeViewModel model = new TreeViewModel(); model.Skin = "TreeViewSkin.MSDN" //Where the Skin value should be any on of the TreeView Skintype in Skin { get; set; }

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.TreeViewModel.ExpandAll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the expand all nodes
member.remarks: TreeView allows user to Expand all the nodes in the control, this can be achieved by the property ExpandAll, It just expand all the nodes in the tree view and wired node expand event.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Collapse all the Expanded nodes
member.remarks: TreeView allows user to Collapse all the nodes in the control, this can be achieved by the property CollapseAll It just Collapse all the Expanded nodes in the tree view and wired node Collapse event.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.TreeViewModel.CheckAll
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the Check all the checkboxed of the nodes
member.remarks: TreeView allows user to check all the nodes in the control, this can be achieved by the property CheckAll It just Check all the Expanded nodes of the tree view

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.TreeViewModel.AllowEdit
member.remarks: TreeView allows user to Edit the nodes in the control.This can be achieved by the property AllowEdit.When set to true will allow renaming/editing the nodes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.TreeViewModel.ShowCheckbox
member.remarks: TreeView allows user to select the multiple nodes in the control.This can be achieved by the property ShowCheckbox.When set to true will allow to select the multiple nodes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Mvc.Tools.TreeViewModel.AllowKeyboardNavigation
